subject: feat(scaffold): Phase 0 — project scaffolding with Vue 3, Vite, TypeScript
body:
Set up the complete project structure for budgy-ting PWA. This establishes the
foundation that all subsequent phases build on: build tooling, routing, database
schema, type definitions, and the app shell UI.

Scaffolding includes:
- Vite + Vue 3 + TypeScript project (package.json, tsconfigs)
- UnoCSS with Tailwind preset, brand colours, utility shortcuts
- vite-plugin-pwa with manifest configuration
- Dexie.js v4 schema v1 (budgets, expenses, actuals, categoryCache)
- TypeScript data models matching product definition
- Vue Router with budget list and budget detail (3 nested tabs)
- AppLayout component (header, max-width content area)
- BudgetListView with empty/loading/list states
- BudgetDetailView with tab navigation
- Stub tab views (Expenses, Projected, Compare)
- Product definition saved to docs/PRODUCT_DEFINITION.md
- Updated README, TODO, SESSION_NOTES, HISTORY, USER_ACTIONS
